AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.Name: SerenHAR
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: seren
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description: An alien species native to an Earth-like planet named Panastria. Their original creation myth says that they are made of stardust and fell onto Panastria, but their is no concrete evidence of this. After a failed uprising against the Empire, most are being relocated from their homeworld or imprisoned until further notice.
